statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x54cd...' AND receiver_address = '0x02d9...';
SELECT transaction_hash, amount, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE status = 'pending' AND amount < 500 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE receiver_address = '0x04f5...' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789' AND receiver_address != '0x987654321';
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY sender_address ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY status ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT from_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT to_address, amount, transaction_timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT from_address, to_address, transaction_timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE from_address = 'Alice';
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM network_activity WHERE node_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123abc' AND to_address = '0x456def' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp, activity_data FROM network_activity WHERE activity_type = 'request' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE node_id = '123-abc-456' AND activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount_transferred FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT activity_id, timestamp, action FROM network_activity WHERE sender_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_details FROM dashboard_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 100.00;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x1A1E2';
SELECT * FROM network_activity ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT action FROM network_activity;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blocks ORDER BY block_size DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT address FROM addresses ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, receiver_address FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice';
SELECT block_id, timestamp, block_size FROM blocks ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT address_id, address, balance FROM addresses WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sender_address, amount DESC;
SELECT status, update_time FROM transaction_status WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM network_activity WHERE action = 'connect' AND source_ip = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 3;
